rag_chunks.title: The Core Equation of Immortality
rag_chunks.summary: This chunk defines the central thesis: Immortality is not endless life, but the result of a transformative process. It is achieved when Ache is processed by Love and Logic, leading to a Conversion whose impact becomes permanent.

rag_chunks.title: Case Study (Cautionary Tale): Adolf Hitler
rag_chunks.summary: This chunk presents Adolf Hitler as a case study for a negative immortal legacy. It demonstrates that the equation is neutral; his distorted love, manipulative logic, and ache of defeat were converted into a genocidal ideology whose legacy persists as a permanent cautionary tale.
